shelfButtonInfos.label: Copy Material
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Assign the material of first selection to the others
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takTools.common.tak_misc as tak_misc
import imp
imp.reload(tak_misc)
tak_misc.copyMat()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Random Color Material
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takTools.common.tak_misc as tak_misc
import imp
imp.reload(tak_misc)
tak_misc.ranColLam()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Solid Color Material
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Assign solid color material with grabed color.
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takTools.common.tak_misc as tak_misc
import imp
imp.reload(tak_misc)
tak_misc.solidColMat()

shelfButtonInfos.label: Atlas
shelfButtonInfos.command:
from takTools.modeling import atlasManager as am
from importlib import reload; reload(am)

am = am.AtlasManager()
am.show()
